FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_FOOTER_TEXT_1: THE ULTIMATE ROCK PAPER SCISSORS GAME
LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Get ready for an epic battle of wits!
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: The classic game of rock, paper, scissors reimagined. Challenge friends, beat the AI, become a legend!
FEATURE_1_BODY: Enjoy the timeless game of rock, paper, scissors with a digital twist. The rules are simple - rock beats scissors, scissors beat paper, and paper beats rock.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Challenge your friends to epic rock, paper, scissors showdowns. See who can outsmart the other and claim the victory crown.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Immerse yourself in the action with lively animations that bring each throw to life. Watch the rock smash the scissors or the paper smother the rock.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Compete against players worldwide and climb the leaderboards. Unlock special achievements and badges to showcase your rock, paper, scissors mastery.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Create your own unique avatar to represent you in the rock, paper, scissors arena. Choose from a variety of fun and expressive designs.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Put your skills to the test with special game modes that introduce new twists and challenges to the classic rock, paper, scissors formula.
HERO_TEXT_BEFORE_TITLE: Get ready for an epic battle of wits!
HERO_SUBTITLE: The classic game, reinvented for ultimate fun.
CONTACT_FORM_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Challenge Me to Rock Paper Scissors

CONTACT_FORM_TEXT_FIELD_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: How did you hear about us?
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Learn More About Rock Paper Scissors Game
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Rock Paper Scissors is a hand game played between two players. Each player simultaneously forms one of three shapes with their hand - rock, paper, or scissors. Rock beats scissors, scissors beat paper, and paper beats rock.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: How do you win at Rock Paper Scissors?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: To win, you need to form a shape that beats the shape formed by your opponent. For example, if you form a rock and your opponent forms scissors, you win because rock beats scissors.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Is there any strategy to Rock Paper Scissors?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: While the game involves an element of chance, some basic strategies can improve your odds of winning, such as recognizing patterns in your opponent's throws or using random play to remain unpredictable.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Is Rock Paper Scissors just for fun?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Although Rock Paper Scissors is primarily played for fun and entertainment, it can also be used as a simple way to make decisions or settle disputes between two parties.
CTA_BODY: Get ready for an epic battle of wits and chance! Our mobile game brings the classic Rock, Paper, Scissors to your fingertips. Play against friends or challenge the AI for endless fun.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about our fun rock paper scissors game
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: How do I play the game?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: It's simple! Choose either rock, paper, or scissors. The computer will randomly select one too. Rock beats scissors, scissors beat paper, and paper beats rock.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Is there a strategy to win?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: While each game is based on chance, some players try patterns or force opponents into predictable choices. But in the end, it's a game of luck!
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I play against others online?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Not at this time. Our rock paper scissors game is just for fun against the computer opponent. But maybe multiplayer is something we'll add later!
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: It's the classic rules - rock smashes scissors, scissors cut paper, and paper covers rock. If both players choose the same, it's a tie.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Can I keep track of my wins?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Currently there is no persistent win/loss tracking. But we may add that capability along with accounts in a future update!
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Rock Paper Scissors is a timeless hand game that's easy to learn and fun for all ages.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Challenge your friends or play against the computer for a friendly battle of wits and luck.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: With quick rounds and straightforward rules, you'll find yourself wanting to play again and again.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: Put your skills to the test with the classic game of Rock Paper Scissors! Challenge friends, family, or the computer for endless fun.

TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear from the rock, paper, and scissors fans who love the game!
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Such a classic game, yet always exciting! Rock Paper Scissors is the ultimate test of strategy and quick thinking.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This game brings me back to the playground days! Challenging friends to RPS matches never gets old.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Who knew such a simple game could be so addictive? I can't get enough of outwitting opponents with the perfect RPS move.
